pages.text: 42|52|ileohge hayeo hananim-eun geubun ui myeonglyeong-eulo geudaeege gyesihananigeudaeneun ijeon-e seongseoga mueos-imyeo mid-eum-i mueos-inji alji moshaessnola geuleona hananim-eun kkulan-eul gwangmyeong-eulohago geugeos-eulo geubun-ui tteus-i issneun jongdeul-eul indohadolog hayeossnola sillogeudaeneun ingan-eul olh-eun gillo indoha lila
42|53|geu gil-eun haneulgwa daejie issneunmodeun geos-eul soyuhasin hananim-ui gil ila bola modeun geos-i hananimkkelo hyanghaji anhneunyo
43|3|hananim-eun geugeos-eul alab-eolo gyesihayeoss-euni ilo hayeo neohuiga i haehago baeudolog ham-ila
43|4|sillo geugeos-eun hananim seongseoui mojeon-e issneun geos-eulo jihyega gadeug chaewojin geos-ila
43|5|neohuiga beos-eonan baegseong-ila hayeohananimkkeseo neohui moduleul bangchihal su issgessneunyo
43|7|yeeonjaga ileuji anihan gos-ieobs-eoss-euna salamdeul-i geuleul jolonghaessnola
43|8|geulihayeo hananim-eun ideulboda him-i ganghan geudeul-eul myeolmangke hago yes baegseongdeul-ui biyuga gyohun-i doedo log hayeossnola
43|9|geudaega geudeul-ege cheonjileul changjohan bun-i nugusinyo lago mudneundamyeon gwonneung-gwa jihyelo chungmanhasin hananim-e-uihae changjodoeeossseubnida lago geudeul-eundaedabhalila
43|10|geubun-eun daejileul dueo neohuiuihyusigcheolo hasigo geu an-e gil-eul dusini ilo hayeo neohuiga indodoe dolog hagoja ham-ila
